import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const footerLinks = { company: [ { label: 'About Us', path: '/about' }, { label: 'Courses', path: '/courses' }, { label: 'Events', path: '/events' }, { label: 'Blog', path: '/blog' }, { label: 'Contact', path: '/contact' }, ], resources: [ { label: 'Language Learning Tips', path: '/blog' }, { label: 'Success Stories', path: '/blog' }, { label: 'FAQs', path: '/contact' }, { label: 'Privacy Policy', path: '/privacy' }, { label: 'Terms of Service', path: '/terms' }, ], social: [ { label: 'Twitter', url: 'https://x.com/Pearlsonke', icon: ( ), }, { label: 'Instagram', url: 'https://www.instagram.com/pearlson_languages/', icon: ( ), }, { label: 'Facebook', url: 'https://web.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61576307943244', icon: ( ), }, ], }; return (
{/* Company Info */}

Empowering individuals through language education and cultural exchange.

{footerLinks.social.map((social) => ( {social.icon} ))}
{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

    {footerLinks.company.map((link) => (
  • {link.label}
    • ))}
{/* Resources */}

Resources

    {footerLinks.resources.map((link) => (
  • {link.label}
    • ))}
{/* Contact Info */}

Contact Us

  • info@pearlsonlanguages.co.ke
  • 0727211822
  • Nairobi, Kenya
{/* Copyright */}

© {currentYear} Pearlson Languages and Solutions. All rights reserved.

); }; export default Footer;
